content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Mr. Trabelsi. What are your thoughts on the rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student, so I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me an idea of what the rental price might be?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would need to know more about your budget and the length of your stay in Mannheim in order to give you a more accurate price. Would you be able to provide me with that information?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I am looking for something less than 500 Euros per month. And I will be staying in Mannheim for a year.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Understood, Mr. Trabelsi. Based on the information you've provided, I would be happy to negotiate with you on the rental price. However, please keep in mind that the price I am able to offer will depend on a variety of factors, including the location of the apartment, its condition, and the current demand for rental properties in Mannheim. Would you be willing to share more about your preferences and requirements for the apartment? This will help me to provide you with a more accurate rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine
